item.description:
Join us for a foraging event on Mother's Day at Green Meadows! We will try to have a monthly event at the farm to follow the progress of wild edible and medicinal plants through the seasons. 

Iris Weaver will again lead our group on a tour through the woodland and open areas. This will be a great opportunity for those who want to learn to identify plants during the different growing stages. 

The loose agenda:

1:00- Meet and greet in the parking lot near the entrance.
1:15- Start the tour through the wooded area and continue to the field edges.
3:00ish- Share a quick snack and wrap up.

Please bring:
-Appropriate footwear- some areas are wet and boggy
-A pocket knife, hand trowel or other small tool to gather samples
-A weather resistant basket or bag
-Maybe a camera to post photos of our finds
-A simple snack to share with the group
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the fence near the parking lot entrance
item.name: Mother's Day Foraging
